channel.title: 1up Brothers
channel.description: 1Up Brothers podcast is where we review news, rumors and releases within the videogame industry, and give our opinions as well.
channel.itunes:summary: 1Up Brothers podcast is where we review news, rumors and releases within the videogame industry, and give our opinions as well.
channel.itunes:author: Andy Rusiecki & Tom Rusiecki

item.title: Episode 6 - Gamescom Recap
item.dc:creator: the1upbrothers
item.description:
Recorded on August 14th 2014
This week, we recap the news from Gamescom.
1Up Brothers podcast is where we review news, rumors and releases within the videogame industry, and give our opinions as well.
Send feedback to info@1upbrothers.com
Go to 1upbrothers.com for the audio version!
———————————————-
Link Dump:
News
Gamescom press events:
Xbox
The next Tomb Raider is an Xbox exclusive, Crystal Dynamics explains why
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994211/the-next-tomb-raider-is-an-xbox-exclusive
Xbox One pre-loading begins in September with FIFA 15 and Forza Horizon 2
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994467/xbox-one-pre-loading-forza-horizon-fi [...]
item.content:encoded:
Recorded on August 14th 2014
This week, we recap the news from Gamescom.
1Up Brothers podcast is where we review news, rumors and releases within the videogame industry, and give our opinions as well.
Send feedback to info@1upbrothers.com
Go to 1upbrothers.com for the audio version!
———————————————-
Link Dump:
News
Gamescom press events:
Xbox
The next Tomb Raider is an Xbox exclusive, Crystal Dynamics explains why
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994211/the-next-tomb-raider-is-an-xbox-exclusive
Xbox One pre-loading begins in September with FIFA 15 and Forza Horizon 2
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994467/xbox-one-pre-loading-forza-horizon-fifa-15
Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Xbox One bundle hits Nov. 3 for $499.99
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994275/call-duty-advanced-warfare-xbox-one-bundle
There is a white Xbox One console and gamepad coming this October
http://www.engadget.com/2014/08/12/white-xbox-one/
Here’s some indies MS announced
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994549/id-xbox-indie-games-xbox-one-gamescom-2014
Smite Coming to Xbox One
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5994249/smite-xbox-one 
Discussion: Kinect is Dead
Playstation
Upcoming PS4 System Update to v2.00 to Add Share Play, YouTube and More to Come
http://blog.us.playstation.com/2014/08/12/upcoming-ps4-system-update-to-v2-00-to-add-share-play-youtube-and-more-to-come/
PlayStation TV launching Oct. 14 in North America
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5995497/playstation-tv-release-date-north-america
PS4: 10 Million and Going Strong
http://blog.us.playstation.com/2014/08/12/ps4-10-million-and-going-strong/
DayZ is coming to PlayStation 4
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5995325/dayz-coming-to-playstation-4
Other notable indies for PS4 in this article
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/12/5995669/sony-gamescom-ps4-news
Discussion: Vita is Dead
Changelog
Phoenix Wright’s latest adventure Dual Destinies is coming to iOS
http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/8/5982959/phoenix-wright-ace-attorney-dual-destinies-ios-announcement
Award-winning Monument Valley recouped costs in one week
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/08/11/monument-valley-recouped-costs-in-one-week/
Payday developer reveals co-op Walking Dead game
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/08/13/payday-developer-reveals-co-op-walking-dead-game/

item.title: Episode 5 - Incredible Segue Machine
item.dc:creator: the1upbrothers
item.description:
Recorded on August 7th, 2014

This week we talk about EA Access, Playstation Now and Homefront is staying alive!

1Up Brothers podcast is where we review news, rumors and releases within the videogame industry, and give our opinions as well.

Send feedback to info@1upbrothers.com
Go to 1upbrothers.com for the audio version!

———————————————-[...]
item.content:encoded:
Recorded on August 7th, 2014

This week we talk about EA Access, Playstation Now and Homefront is staying alive!

1Up Brothers podcast is where we review news, rumors and releases within the videogame industry, and give our opinions as well.

Send feedback to info@1upbrothers.com
Go to 1upbrothers.com for the audio version!

———————————————-

Link Dump:

News

EA Access on Xbox One offers top games and big discounts for $5 a month 
Sony rejected EA Access for the PS4 because it’s not worth the money 
PlayStation Now rentals cost $2.99 for four hours play, but everything could be changing 
Twitch implements YouTube-like system for blocking copyrighted audio 
Nintendo lost $97M last quarter even with the success of Mario Kart 8 
Nintendo loses one of its few known forces for positive change 
Homefront: The Revolution devs to move to Deep Silver as Crytek scales back two studios 
Evolve pushed back to February  
3D Blu-ray support arrives in latest PlayStation 4 update 
The original BioShock is headed to iOS this summer 
Xbox One bundles for Sunset Overdrive and Madden NFL 15 are on the way 
Resident Evil 1 is getting remastered for a new generation in 2015 
Sleeping Dogs coming to PS4, Xbox One this October 
Sony is giving up on PlayStation Mobile for Android 
Live TV and the OneGuide Coming to More Households with Xbox One Digital TV Tuner 
Xbox One to Launch Next Generation of Gaming in China September 23 
Report: GameStop to revamp ‘complex’ trade-in program

item.itunes:author: Andy Rusiecki & Tom Rusiecki

item.title: Episode 4 - Destiny Beta Recap
item.dc:creator: the1upbrothers
item.description:
This week, we recap the Destiny Beta and give our opinions on it, EA delays two games, and a couple lawsuits.

Recorded on July 24th, 2014
item.content:encoded:
This week, we recap the Destiny Beta and give our opinions on it, EA delays two games, and a couple lawsuits.

Recorded on July 24th, 2014


Link Dump:

Destiny’s most awkward line of dialog vanishes from the beta
Destiny makes its 1080p Xbox One premiere

EA Delays: Dragon Age to November, Battlefield Hardline to 2015

June NPD: Hardware sales up, Watch Dogs and Mario Kart top 

Extremely toxic League of Legends players threatened with instant and permanent bans

Google’s Deal to Buy Twitch Confirmed, According to New Report

Xbox One August update makes downloading games easier, adds Achievement leaderboards

Quantum Break not impacted by Xbox Entertainment Studios closure

Titanfall getting in-game currency in update 5, coming July 31 with Frontier’s Edge map pack

Report: Former Bungie composer O’Donnell settles case

Sony: We settled PSN hack suit to avoid trial costs, but ‘continue to deny the allegations’
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, we recap the Destiny Beta and give our opinions on it, EA delays two games, and a couple lawsuits.Recorded on July 24th, 2014Link ...

item.title: Episode 3 - Destiny Not Guaranteed
item.dc:creator: the1upbrothers
item.description:
This week, we cover the Destiny beta’s shaky launch on PS4, Microsoft’s success with a Kinect-less Xbox One, and DOTA2 on ESPN3.

Recorded on July 17th, 2014


Link Dump:

Survey finds a quarter of top YouTubers taking cut from publishers

Microsoft sees Xbox One sales double without Kinect [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week, we cover the Destiny beta’s shaky launch on PS4, Microsoft’s success with a Kinect-less Xbox One, and DOTA2 on ESPN3.

Recorded on July 17th, 2014


Link Dump:

Survey finds a quarter of top YouTubers taking cut from publishers

Microsoft sees Xbox One sales double without Kinect
Microsoft to shutter Xbox Entertainment Studios
Digital pre-orders coming to Xbox One by October 2014

Early Access options could come to Both PS4 and Xbox One
PlayStation Network experiencing issues ahead of Destiny beta launch 

The International Dota 2 championships will be watchable on ESPN3

Former dictator Manuel Noriega sues Call of Duty creator
Streaming gameplay on Mac just got a lot easier

Captain Falcon joins Fire Emblem: Awakening heroes in Super Smash Bros.

Grand Theft Auto 5 for PC may release November 14, according to retailer
Oculus halts Rift pre-orders for suspected resellers

QuakeCon 2014 kicks off today
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, we cover the Destiny beta's shaky launch on PS4, Microsoft's success with a Kinect-less Xbox One, and DOTA2 on ESPN3.Recorded on July 17th, ...

item.title: Episode 2 - Stay Inside, It’s Hot Out
item.dc:creator: the1upbrothers
item.description:
Recorded on July 10th, 2014.

This week, we talk about Sunset Overdrive, the Destiny Beta, and Oculus VR gets it’s own developer conference.

Link Dump:
Watch Sunset Overdrive’s intro cinematic, 8 minu [...]
item.content:encoded:
Recorded on July 10th, 2014.

This week, we talk about Sunset Overdrive, the Destiny Beta, and Oculus VR gets it’s own developer conference.

Link Dump:
Watch Sunset Overdrive’s intro cinematic, 8 minutes of gameplay
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/07/sunset-overdrive-opening-gameplay/

Destiny beta runs July 17-28 on PS3 and PS4, July 23-28 on Xbox 360 and Xbox One
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/7/5877511/destiny-beta-dates-ps4-xbox-one-ps3-xbox-360-trailer 

Report: Classically-animated Cuphead roughly ‘40 percent done’
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/07/report-classically-animated-cuphead-roughly-40-percent-done/

PS4 fails to impact Japanese console market
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/8/5880255/ps4-fails-to-impact-japanese-console-market

Watch Dogs sells a boat load
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/10/ubisoft-reports-first-quarter-growth-of-374-bolstered-by-watch/

Oculus VR’s own developer conference, Oculus Connect, runs Sept. 19-20
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/7/5877773/oculus-connect-vr-dates-raknet

Kinect 2.0 finds a home on PC July 15
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/06/kinect-2-0-finds-a-home-on-pc-july-15/ 

Command & Conquer multiplayer is saved following GameSpy shutdown
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/7/5876661/command-and-conquer-multiplayer-online-servers-gamespy

GameStop may seek exclusive content during a game’s development
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/08/gamestop-may-seek-exclusive-content-during-a-games-development/

Grim Fandango remake also coming to PC, Mac and Linux
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/09/grim-fandango-remake-also-coming-to-pc-mac-and-linux/ 

Dota 2’s The International starts today (July 8th)
http://www.pcgamer.com/2014/07/08/dota-2s-the-international-starts-today/

Report: Thief movie under way from Vertigo, Prime
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/09/report-thief-movie-under-way-from-vertigo-prime/

item.title: Episode 1 - The Wolfing Dead
item.dc:creator: the1upbrothers
item.description:
Recorded on July 3rd, 2014

This week we talk gender bias in eSports, gameplay streaming getting bigger with SGDQ, and more game devs are in trouble with Airtight Games closing and Crytek possibly on the way out.
item.content:encoded:
Recorded on July 3rd, 2014

This week we talk gender bias in eSports, gameplay streaming getting bigger with SGDQ, and more game devs are in trouble with Airtight Games closing and Crytek possibly on the way out.


Hearthstone tournament does not allow women
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/2/58641…

Youtube adding 60 fps
http://www.polygon.com/2014/6/26/5847…

SGDQ raises over $700,000
http://gamingillustrated.com/sgdq-201…

Crytek in financial trouble
http://kotaku.com/sources-crytek-not-…

Report: Murdered: Soul Suspect developer Airtight Games closes
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/07/02/rep…

Minecraft console sales surpass PC sales
http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/06/2…

Evolve, No Man’s Sky take most of E3 Awards
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/1/58617…

Xbox.com adds XB1 game clips, achievements
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/06/28/xbo…

Dualshock 4 support added to PS3
http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/2/58634…

Walking Dead/Wolf Among Us coming to PS4/XB1 this fall
http://www.polygon.com/2014/6/30/5858…

GTA Lead buys church 
http://www.joystiq.com/2014/06/30/gra…

First-ever Smite World Championship coming in January with $600,000 prize pool
http://www.pcgamer.com/2014/07/02/fir…

This Week’s Releases
http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/06/3…
